pages.text: $(li)When you die, your items are automatically saved in the Totem of Holding.$(br)$(li)This one can be found in the place where you died.$(br)$(li)Also a waypoint will have been created on the $(l:patchouli:perks/minimap)minimap$(/l).$(br)$(li)Head towards that location to retrieve your items.
$(li)Your $(l)Last Death$() location is represent with the white skull icon in the Minimap.

$(li)Once you reach the location of your $(l)Last Death$(), you will find the Totem of Holding floating.$(br)$(li)Now, just hit it so that your items are automatically saved in your inventory.$(br)$(li)Make sure you have enough space or the items stored in the Totem of Holding will fall to the ground.
$(li)The Totem of Holding can not be destroyed by lava, explosions or any kind of creature.
